topic.title: NES Games work on zero.pags.to, but not local 127.0.0.1?
topic.body:
Can play for example Bubble Bobble on zero.pags.to:
http://zero.pags.to:43110/19za8TViGJF4xdvkQHLXK2UCb2gLC1nSVT

but playing inside zeronet gives me only errors (ROM not found):
http://127.0.0.1:43110/19za8TViGJF4xdvkQHLXK2UCb2gLC1nSVT

Anyone confirm or have an idea why?

1_1BcZsGUukq1TniaAmvqExJsd1SEFRdB2Hy.body:
Ah, thanks for the info!

So it only works because zeropags doesnt have "latest" zeronet?
(Btw. on zeropags homepage it says v0.3.5 (r830) and "latest 0.3.2" - what does that mean?)
